title: The Auld Hoose
typeOfFood: Lacto, Ovo, Western, Beer/Wine, Mexican, British, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A pub-type restaurant, offers vegetarian and vegan dishes, including a full English breakfast, burgers, sides, chili, burritos, haggis, nachos, desserts (although only sorbet for vegans). Vegan cheese is an add-on for most dishes, or a substitute for a dish that comes with cheese. Re-open Feb 9, 2016 after refurbishment.
